## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                              | Type                | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `label`   | `label`   | The label displayed inside of the div                    | `string`            | `undefined` |
| `variant` | `variant` | The variant of the button, such as primary and secondary | `"error" \| "info"` | `'error'`   |
